page.title: 15Hobbies and Leisure
page.content: Being so close to the{Lake District this area offers a lot of scope for Hobbies and Leisure activities. Outdoor pursuits include Archery, Ferreting,Fishing,Birdwatching,Hound Trailing,Riding,Cycling,Clay and Duck Shooting, along with Gardening and Walking. There are many indoor hobbies and the range is extended by local evening classes.You will find opportunities for Opera,Painting,Woodwork,Tapestry making,Flowercrafts and a variety of indoor sports.There is a local Silver Band,dancing classes in Ballet,Modern Tap and Disco. Regular sponsored events take place for local charities.There are annual carnivals and flower/craft festivals. There is even a Raft race on a small river near Cark.
